## IControllerKeypressEvent interface

Key press event for camera controllers.

Triggered when a key is pressed and generates a character value (legacy usage).

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface IControllerKeypressEvent extends IControllerKeyboardEvent<'keypress'> 
```
**Extends:** [IControllerKeyboardEvent](doc/markdown/./scene.icontrollerkeyboardevent.md)<!-- -->&lt;'keypress'&gt;
